constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 110 (Friday, July 1, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. TORRES of New York:
H.R. 8278.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8
[Page H5931]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security.

title: To direct the Attorney General to conduct a study on the efficacy of extreme risk protection orders on reducing gun violence, and for other purposes.
